name: Encore (RML, Andre Roz, Yeray101, Cynthia)
description:
For the best user experience, we recommend playing in VR with Quest 2

Story :

Recently losing his wife, a man processes grieving through his own fragmented memories. 

He will have to switch between the different states of his life, switching between being a child again, an adult or being your old self.

Through this journey, he will have to finally accept his new reality...

Can be played with Mouse/Keyboard, Gamepad or Quest 2 (VR)

Controls :

VR

- Left joystick to move character

- A to jump

- X to Age Down/ Y to Age Up

- Move Right joystick to rotate in space

- Hold Grip button to grab and move item

- Move Right joystick to move forward/backward grabbed item

Keyboard

- WASD to move character

- Space to jump

- C to Age Down/ V to Age Up

- Move Mouse to rotate in space

- Hold Left click to grab and move item

- Scroll up/down to move forward/backward grabbed item

Gamepad

- Left joystick to move character

- Top front button (Y for Xbox) to jump

- Left trigger to Age Down/ Right trigger to Age Up

- Right joystick to rotate in space

- Hold Left bumper/L1 to grab and move item

- D-Pad Up/Down to move forward/backward grabbed item
